flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: LATIAS is highly sensitive to thenemotions of people. If it senses anynhostility, this POKéMON ruffles theffeathers all over its body and criesnshrilly to intimidate the foe.
LATIAS is highly intelligent and capablenof understanding human speech.nIt is covered with a glass-like down.fThe POKéMON enfolds its body with itsndown and refracts light to alter itsnappearance.
They make a small herd of only severalnmembers. They rarely make contact withnpeople or other POKéMON. They disappearnif they sense enemies.
It can telepathically communicate withnpeople. It changes its appearance usingnits down that refracts light.
It can telepathically communicate withnpeople. It changes its appearance usingnits down that refracts light.
Its body is covered with a downnthat can refract light in such anway that it becomes invisible.
Its body is covered with a downnthat can refract light in such anway that it becomes invisible.
Its body is covered with a downnthat can refract light in such anway that it becomes invisible.
It communicates using telepathy.nIts body is covered in down thatnrefracts light to make it invisible.
It communicates using telepathy.nIts body is covered in down thatnrefracts light to make it invisible.
Son corps est recouvert d’un nduvet qui reflète la lumièrenet le rend invisible.
Its body is covered with a downnthat can refract light in such anway that it becomes invisible.
Son corps est recouvert d’un nduvet qui reflète la lumièrenet le rend invisible.
Its body is covered with a downnthat can refract light in such anway that it becomes invisible.
Its body is covered with a downnthat can refract light in such anway that it becomes invisible.
Its body is covered with a downnthat can refract light in such anway that it becomes invisible.
テレパシーで　きもちを　かよわせる。nひかりを　くっせつさせる　うもうでnからだを　つつみ　すがたを　けす。
텔레파시로 마음이 통한다.n빛을 굴절시키는 깃털로n몸을 둘러싸 모습을 지운다.
Il est doué d’empathie. Le duvet qui recouvre sonncorps réfléchit la lumière et le rend invisible.
Es kommuniziert durch Telepathie. Sein Daunenkleidnbricht das Licht, sodass es unsichtbar wird.
Se comunica por telepatía. Su plumaje refleja la luz, lonque le permite hacerse invisible.
Sa comunicare telepaticamente. Le piume sul suoncorpo riflettono la luce e lo rendono invisibile.
It communicates using telepathy. Its body isncovered in down that refracts light to makenit invisible.
テレパシーで　気持ちを　通わせる。n光を　屈折させる　羽毛でn体を　包み　姿を　消す。
テレパシーで　にんげんと　きもちをnかよわせる。ひかりを　くっせつさせるnうもうで　べつの　すがたに　かわる。
텔레파시로 인간과 마음을n교감한다. 빛을 굴절시키는n깃털로 다른 모습으로 변신한다.
Latias peut communiquer avec les gens par télépathie.nIl change son apparence en renvoyant la lumière.
Mittels Telepathie kann es mit Menschennkommunizieren. Mit seinen Daunen, die das Lichtnbrechen, kann es sein Aussehen verändern.
Se comunica por telepatía con la gente. Cambia denaspecto refractando luz con el plumaje.
Sa comunicare telepaticamente con gli umani. Si servendella luce riflessa dal piumaggio per cambiare aspetto.
It can telepathically communicate with people. Itnchanges its appearance using its down thatnrefracts light.
テレパシーで　人間と　気持ちをn通わせる。光を　屈折させるn羽毛で　別の　姿に　変わる。
にんげんの　こころを　びんかんに　かんじとる。nてきいを　キャッチすると　ぜんしんの　はねをnさかだてて　はげしく　なきごえで　いかくする。
인간의 마음을 민감히 감지해낸다.n적의를 느끼면 전신의 깃털을n곤두세우고 격렬한 울음소리로 위협한다.
Latias est extrêmement sensible aux émotions des gens.nS’il ressent une hostilité, ce Pokémon ébouriffe ses plumesnet pousse un cri strident pour intimider son ennemi.

Latias ist in höchstem Maße empfindlich gegenüber dennEmotionen der Menschen. Wenn es einen Anflug vonnFeindseligkeit wahrnimmt, werden seine Federn zerzaustnund es stößt schrille Schreie aus, um seinen Gegnerneinzuschüchtern.
Latias es muy sensible a los sentimientos de la gente. Sindetecta algún ápice de hostilidad, desplegará las plumas quentiene por todo el cuerpo y se pondrá a chillar para intimidar alnenemigo.
Latias è sensibilissimo alle emozioni delle persone.nSe percepisce una certa ostilità, questo Pokémon arruffanle piume su tutto il corpo ed emette un grido lancinantenper intimidire il nemico.
Latias is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it sensesnany hostility, this Pokémon ruffles the feathers all over its bodynand cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.
人間の　心を　敏感に　感じとる。n敵意を　キャッチすると　全身の　羽をn逆立てて　激しく　鳴き声で　威嚇する。
ちのうが　たかく　ひとの　ことばを　りかいする。nガラスの　ような　うもうで　からだを　つつみこみnひかりを　くっせつさせて　すがたを　かえる。
지능이 높아 사람의 말을 이해한다.n몸을 감싼 유리 같은 깃털로n빛을 굴절시켜 모습을 바꾼다.

Latias est très intelligent et comprend le langage des hommes.nIl est recouvert d’une espèce de duvet ressemblant à du verre.nCe Pokémon s’enveloppe dans ce duvet et reflète la lumièrenpour changer son apparence.

Latias ist sehr intelligent und kann die menschlichenSprache verstehen. Es ist mit gläsernen Daunen bedeckt.nDieses Pokémon umhüllt seinen Körper mit den Daunennund kann Licht brechen, um seine Gestalt zu verändern.

Latias tiene un nivel de inteligencia tan alto que es capaz denentender el lenguaje humano. Este Pokémon usa el plumónncristalizado del que está cubierto como peto para refractar lanluz y cambiar de aspecto.
Estremamente intelligente, Latias è in grado di capirenil linguaggio umano. Il suo corpo è ricoperto di piuminonvetroso che usa per rifrangere la luce e mutare il proprionaspetto.
Latias is highly intelligent and capable of understandingnhuman speech. It is covered with a glass-like down.nThe Pokémon enfolds its body with its down and refractsnlight to alter its appearance.
知能が　高く　人の　言葉を　理解する。nガラスの　ような　羽毛で　体を　包み込みn光を　屈折させて　姿を　変える。
